duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and sales assistance in a retail environment.
Perform phone repair, including replacing screens, batteries, and other components on smart phones and tablets.
Conduct key cutting and reprogramming of key fob remotes.
Gain a quick and solid understanding of company's electronic retail and cross-referencing system.
Ability to work with small parts and tools for phone repair and device repair.
Lift and move items weighing up to 50 lbs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/equivalent and 6 months prior work experience preferred
